name: The Diemoire
description:
The Diemoire is built to be used with your favorite tabletop RPGs. It works with the greatest tabletop games, games like Dungeons and Dragons, Shadowrun, Warhammer 40k, Pathfinder and Edge of the Empire. Roll up to 12 dice at a single time and rapidly see what each dice has landed on and their total.

The Diemoire greatly decreases the time you spend trying to find your dice and allows people to play in smaller tabletop spaces. Open the tomb and place the included Dice on to the book, use all your favorite tabletop dice D20, D12, D10, D8, D6, and D4!

The Diemoire includes music and sound effects and feels like an ancient long lost tome containing all of the secrets of these ancient dice. Find the lore behind each one of the dice written by Cantiz the Great!

Dice rolling no longer needs a giant table!

Tested and Optimal performance on Samsung Galaxy S3 and S4!
